classes.name: TumultCommand
classes.description:
A command that will be called if it's name is send as a message
TODO -> Multiple class for command, derived from base command. Message / reaction / etc

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the command, which will be used to call it

params.name: action
params.description: The function the command will execute when called. TODO -> not mandatory. Make Prefix Command and Action Command

params.name: options.subCommand
params.description: The sub commands that will be matched against the rest of the messages if this command is called

params.name: options.generalHelp
params.description: The message that will be returned when someone all the help subcommand on this command

params.name: options.help
params.description: The message that will be returned when being called by the root help command

params.name: options.parser
params.description: The function used to parse the messages and check if this command should be called

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the command, which will be used to call it

methods.name: help
methods.description: Return the help messages. Usually it containes description of the argument, how to use the command and its sub command. TODO -> Getter

methods.name: generalHelp
methods.description: Return the general help message, without description related to argument. Usually it contains information about what the command does. TODO -> default used for error TODO -> Getter

classes.name: TumultController
classes.description: Wrapper around the client, provide interface for events handling and command

params.name: token
params.description: Token of the account to log in with

params.name: commands
params.description: The top level messages commands that will be matched againts every message. TODO -> make commands for message specific.

params.name: config
params.description: Object containing configuration information. TODO -> change (contain only help)

params.name: permission
params.description: Object containing permission information. TODO -> change to a class / structure specific as it has a special format

params.name: option.option
params.description: Options gave by the user, forwarded to every command.

params.name: options.partials
params.description: Options for the client to catch partial. Event will still be emitted when there's no data for a the structure. See the "Partials" on discord.js.org. TODO -> give all option to client

params.name: options.activity
params.description: Activity being played, or options for setting the activity

props.name: options
props.description: Options gave by the user, forwarded to every command.

props.name: config
props.description: Object containing configuration information. TODO -> change (contain only help)

props.name: permission
props.description: Object containing permission information. TODO -> change to a class / structure specific as it has a special format

params.name: commands
params.description: The commands to add to the controller

params.name: path
params.description: The path where to add the command. Each element should be the name of a command, the first one being at the root.

params.name: commandsName
params.description: The names of the commands to remove from the controller

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the commands to be removed. Each element should be the name of a command, the first one being at the root.
